rules_text: Deadeye – {1}{U}: Scry 2. [i](The first time this deals combat damage to a player each turn, you may activate this ability. It costs {0} if this is equipped.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Betsy looked up into the barrel of her rival's gun. She was cleanly defeated, thoroughly humbled ... and, perhaps, in love? [/i]
